Package org.tribuo.classification.explanations.lime

Class LIMETextCLI

java.lang.Object
org.tribuo.classification.explanations.lime.LIMETextCLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.command.CommandGroup
public class LIMETextCLI extends Object implements com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.command.CommandGroup
A CLI for interacting with LIMEText. Uses a simple tokenisation and text extraction pipeline.
